Pangani mosamala chigoba, kuwonjezera zokhotakhota m'mphepete komwe mukufuna. Kuti mupange chigoba kumaso kwanu, gwirani mauna kutsogolo kwa nkhope yanu ndi zala zanu zolozera pamwamba pa maso. Kanikizani mauna kumaso kwanu, kupanga indentations pomwe maso anu ali, kuumba pamwamba pa mphuno yanu, ndi kupindika pamphumi ndi masaya anu.
sol2: Kuti mupange maziko a chigoba chanu, gwiritsani ntchito mauna osema kuti mupange mawonekedwe. Ikani chigoba chanu pamwamba pa mauna kuti chikhale chofanana ndi tirigu wa mauna, ndipo gwiritsani ntchito sharpie kuti mutsatire mozungulira mawonekedwe. Dulani mawonekedwe. Pangani mosamala chigoba, kuwonjezera zokhotakhota m'mphepete komwe mukufuna. Kuti mupange chigoba kumaso kwanu, gwirani mauna kutsogolo kwa nkhope yanu ndi zala zanu zolozera pamwamba pa maso. goal: Kupanga ma waffles aku Belgium
sol1: Mu mbale yayikulu, sakanizani pamodzi supuni ziwiri za ufa wodzikwera, 3/4 chikho cha shuga woyera, ndi supuni 3 3/4 za ufa wophika ndi balloon whisk. Lekanitsani mazira awiri mwa kuphwanya zipolopolozo pamalo athyathyathya, pang'onopang'ono prying zipolopolo zosweka, kulola azungu kutsetsereka kupyola zala zanu mu mbale imodzi pamene akugwira yolks yosweka m'manja mwanu, kuika mu mbale ina. Menyani mazira achikasu pamodzi ndi whisk, ndikuwonjezera 1 1/2 makapu a mkaka, supuni 1 ya vanila ndi 1 chikho cha batala wosungunuka. Whisk. Onjezerani chisakanizo chonyowa mu chisakanizo chouma ndi whisk kachiwiri. Gwiritsani ntchito chosakanizira choyimira ndi chomangira cha whisk choyikidwa kuti mugwiritse ntchito azungu mpaka atagwira nsonga zolimba, kuima molunjika mukachotsa whisk. Pogwiritsa ntchito spatula ya silicone, pang'onopang'ono pindani mazira oyera mu ufa wosakaniza mwa kuika supuni imodzi ya dzira loyera panthawi imodzi mu mbale, kukweza zina mwa chisakanizocho pa azungu ndikubwereza izi pang'onopang'ono mpaka azungu atasakanizidwa kwathunthu ndipo chisakanizocho chimakhala chopepuka komanso chofewa. Samalani kwambiri kuti 'musawonongeke' chisakanizocho, kukankhira mpweya.
sol2: Mu mbale yayikulu, sakanizani pamodzi makapu awiri a ufa wodziyimira pawokha, 3/4 chikho cha shuga woyera, ndi supuni 3 3/4 tiyi ya ufa wophika ndi balloon whisk. Lekanitsani mazira awiri mwa kuphwanya zipolopolozo pamalo athyathyathya, pang'onopang'ono prying zipolopolo zosweka, kulola azungu kutsetsereka kupyola zala zanu mu mbale imodzi pamene akugwira yolks yosweka m'manja mwanu, kuika mu mbale ina. Menyani mazira achikasu pamodzi ndi whisk, ndikuwonjezera 1 1/2 makapu a mkaka, supuni 1 ya vanila ndi 1 chikho cha batala wosungunuka. Whisk. Onjezerani chisakanizo chonyowa mu chisakanizo chouma ndi whisk kachiwiri. Gwiritsani ntchito chosakanizira choyimira ndi chomangira cha whisk choyikidwa kuti mugwiritse ntchito azungu mpaka atagwira nsonga zolimba, kuima molunjika mukachotsa whisk. Pogwiritsa ntchito spatula ya silicone, pang'onopang'ono pindani mazira oyera mu ufa wosakaniza mwa kuika supuni imodzi ya dzira loyera panthawi imodzi mu mbale, kukweza zina mwa chisakanizocho pa azungu ndikubwereza izi pang'onopang'ono mpaka azungu atasakanizidwa kwathunthu ndipo chisakanizocho chimakhala chopepuka komanso chofewa. Samalani kwambiri kuti 'musawonongeke' chisakanizocho, kukankhira mpweya.

goal: Kodi mumapanga bwanji ma cubes a shuga?
sol1: Thirani 1 chikho cha shuga mu mbale ndikuwonjezera madzi pang'onopang'ono pamene mukusakaniza mpaka kukhala chinyezi pang'ono ndi mchenga. Ikani shuga pa poto ndikupanga shuga kukhala mipiringidzo wandiweyani, amakona anayi omwe ali pafupifupi mainchesi 5 ndi mainchesi 2. Dulani mipiringidzo pafupifupi theka pansi mu chitsanzo cha gridi kuti athe kuphwanyidwa mu cubes pambuyo pake. Ikani poto mu pamwamba ndikuphika pa 100 ¬∞ C kwa ola limodzi. Chotsani poto ndikulola kuti mipiringidzo iziziziritse kutentha kwa chipinda. Phwanyani mipiringidzo ya shuga kukhala cubes motsatira chitsanzo cha gridi yomwe mudapeza pamipiringidzo musanaphike.
sol2: Thirani 1 chikho cha shuga mu mbale ndikuwonjezera madzi pang'onopang'ono pamene mukusakaniza mpaka kunyowa. Ikani shuga pa poto ndikupanga shuga kukhala mipiringidzo wandiweyani, amakona anayi omwe ali pafupifupi mainchesi 5 ndi mainchesi 2. Dulani mipiringidzo pafupifupi theka pansi mu chitsanzo cha gridi kuti athe kuphwanyidwa mu cubes pambuyo pake. Ikani poto mu pamwamba ndikuphika pa 100 ¬∞ C kwa ola limodzi. Chotsani poto ndikulola kuti mipiringidzo iziziziritse kutentha kwa chipinda. Phwanyani mipiringidzo ya shuga kukhala cubes motsatira chitsanzo cha gridi yomwe mudapeza pamipiringidzo musanaphike.

goal: Kuti muwonjezere sinamoni swirl mu mkate wanu
sol1: Pambuyo potsimikizira koyamba, isanayambe kulowa mu poto wa mkate, perekani mtandawo mu rectangle lathyathyathya. Pogwiritsa ntchito mpeni wa batala, falitsani batala wofewa kwambiri pamwamba pa magawo awiri mwa atatu a rectangle, ndikusiya pafupifupi gawo limodzi mwa magawo atatu opanda buttered pansi. Kuwaza chisakanizo chanu chosankhidwa cha swirl pa mkate wa buttered - tchizi, ndi sinamoni shuga wofiirira ndi zosankha zabwino, kapena mutha kufalitsa mtanda ndi batala wa adyo. Ndiye, kuyambira ndi m'mphepete pamwamba kwambiri buttered ndi ntchito njira yanu pamodzi kutalika kwa rectangle, mwamphamvu mpukutu mtanda wanu kumbuyo ndi manja anu mpaka kwathunthu anagubuduza. Pindani m'mphepete mwa m'munsi ku mkate wogulung'undisa ndi zala zanu. Ikani mu poto wa mkate kuti mutsimikizire komaliza.
sol2: Pambuyo potsimikizira koyamba, isanayambe kulowa mu poto wa mkate, perekani mtandawo mu rectangle lathyathyathya. Pogwiritsa ntchito foloko , falitsani batala wofewa kwambiri pamwamba pa magawo awiri mwa atatu a rectangle, ndikusiya pafupifupi gawo limodzi mwa magawo atatu osasunthika pansi. Kuwaza chisakanizo chanu chosankhidwa cha swirl pa mkate wa buttered - tchizi, ndi sinamoni shuga wofiirira ndi zosankha zabwino, kapena mutha kufalitsa mtanda ndi batala wa adyo. Pindani m'mphepete mwa m'munsi ku mkate wogulung'undisa ndi zala zanu. Ikani mu poto wa mkate kuti mutsimikizire komaliza.

goal: Momwe mungapangire mkate wa mbatata wokoma
sol1: Bweretsani makapu 2 a mkaka, supuni 2 za batala lililonse ndi shuga wofiirira, supuni 1 ya mchere wa kosher ndi chidutswa cha cayenne kuti chiphike. Chepetsani kutentha kwa simmer; Whisk mu 1/2 chikho cha chimanga. Kuphika, whisking, mpaka kukhumudwa, mphindi 2. Whisk mu 1 chikho cha mbatata zamzitini puree, 3 dzira yolks ndi supuni 1 ya ufa wophika. Chotsani pamoto. Menyani mazira a mazira a 3 mpaka nsonga zolimba; Pindani mu batter. Tumizani ku mbale yophika ya 8-inchi ya buttered; kuphika pa madigiri 375 F mpaka kutupa, mphindi 30.
sol2: Bweretsani makapu 2 a mkaka, supuni 2 za batala lililonse ndi shuga wofiirira, supuni 1 ya mchere wa kosher ndi chidutswa cha cayenne kuti chiphike. Chepetsani kutentha kwa simmer; Whisk mu 1/2 chikho cha chimanga. Kuphika, pureeing, mpaka wandiweyani, mphindi 2. Whisk mu 1 chikho cha mbatata zamzitini puree, 3 dzira yolks ndi supuni 1 ya ufa wophika. Chotsani pamoto. Menyani mazira a mazira a 3 mpaka nsonga zolimba; Pindani mu batter. Tumizani ku mbale yophika ya 8-inchi ya buttered; kuphika pa madigiri 375 F mpaka kutupa, mphindi 30.

goal: Momwe Mungadziwire Poison Oak
sol1: Masamba a chomera ichi amawoneka ngati masamba a oak, nthawi zambiri amakula m'magulu atatu. goal: Kodi mumamangirira bwanji nsalu?
sol1: Mudzafunika utoto wa nsalu m'mbale zosiyana ndi magulu a mphira. Tengani nsalu yanu ndikugwirizanitsa / kupindika kulikonse komwe mukufuna chitsanzo kapena mtundu. Izi zitha kukhala zazing'ono kapena zazikulu. Kenaka tetezani nsalu iliyonse yokhotakhota ndi gulu la mphira ndikuviika mu mtundu wofunidwa kapena gwiritsani ntchito mitundu yoposa imodzi kuti muwonjezere zotsatira. Lolani nsalu youme ndipo mukamadya magulu a mphesa zitsanzozo zidzakhalabe kuphatikizapo dzuwa, mphete ndi kusiyana kosangalatsa mwachisawawa. Mtundu wa chakudya umagwira ntchito mpaka mutatsuka nsaluyo, siyokhazikika.
sol2: Mudzafunika utoto wa nsalu m'mbale zosiyana ndi magulu a mphira. Tengani nsalu yanu ndikugwirizanitsa / kupindika kulikonse komwe mukufuna chitsanzo kapena mtundu. Izi zitha kukhala zazing'ono kapena zazikulu. Kenaka tetezani nsalu iliyonse yokhotakhota ndi gulu la mphira ndikuviika mu mtundu wofunidwa kapena gwiritsani ntchito mitundu yoposa imodzi kuti muwonjezere zotsatira. Lolani nsalu youme ndipo mukamasula maguluwo mapangidwewo adzakhalabe kuphatikizapo kuphulika kwa dzuwa, mphete ndi kusiyana kosangalatsa mwachisawawa. Mtundu wa chakudya umagwira ntchito mpaka mutatsuka nsaluyo, siyokhazikika.

goal: Kodi pali njira yabwino yophulitsira zibaluni za phwando?
sol1: Pamaso pa phwando la tsiku lobadwa kapena chochitika china chofuna chiwerengero chachikulu cha zibaluni zofufuma, ndikothandiza kukhala ndi khumi ndi awiri kapena kuposapo omwe amawomba kufika msanga. Perekani aliyense pang'ono, malingana ndi kuchuluka kwa omwe mukufuna, kenako bwererani kukhitchini kuti mupitirize kukonzekera chakudya. Munthu m'modzi adzadziwa momwe angachitire bwino, kotero onse pamapeto pake adzazindikira.
sol2: Pemphani ana 10 kapena 12 pa theka la ola phwando lisanayambe. Ndi iwo akuyang'ana, phulitsani zibaluni zingapo koma auzeni anawo kuti saloledwa kuwakhudza. Kenako, siyani bokosi la zikhomo patebulo ndikunena kuti "ndipo musakhudze izi" momveka bwino. Tulukani mchipindacho mpaka mutamva phokoso lotuluka.  Mukabwerera, auzeni ngati akufuna zibaluni paphwando ndi omwe akuyenera kuwaphulitsa. Mudzakhala ndi chipinda chodzaza pafupifupi mphindi 10.

goal: Momwe mungapangire Wild Blackberry cobbler kunyumba.
sol1: Sambani makapu 4 atsopano kapena oundana zakutchire blackberries kuponyera zipatso ndi supuni 3 Madzi a mandimu.  Gwiritsani ntchito mpukutu wa Pillsbury Cinnamon (mtundu wa chubu) kuchokera ku gawo lozizira pamsika, ndi pini yogubuduza, mpukutu mpaka osachepera 1/2 inchi wandiweyani.  Ikani m'munsi mwa mphika wophika wachitsulo chakuya / mbale ndi mtanda.  Sungani pafupifupi 1/3 ya mtanda kuti muphimbe.  (Mudzayika izi pamwamba mukamaliza kukonzekera kudzaza.)  Ikani mabulosi akuda m'mbale pamwamba pa mtanda wa mpukutu.  Kuwaza 1 chikho cha khofi wapansi, 2 tbs. Shuga wofiirira supuni 1 sinamoni, 1/2 chikho cha batala (Mu zidutswa zazing'ono), pamwamba.  Kuwaza 1/2 supuni ya mchere pamwamba.  Ikani chitumbuwa pa chirichonse.  Kuphika mu uvuni pa 375 kwa mphindi 40.  Chotsani mu uvuni pamene chitumbuwa cha bulauni ndi pie ndi bubbly.  Sangalalani.
sol2: Sambani makapu 4 atsopano kapena oundana zakutchire blackberries kuponyera zipatso ndi supuni 3 Madzi a mandimu.  Gwiritsani ntchito mpukutu wa Pillsbury Cinnamon (mtundu wa chubu) kuchokera ku gawo lozizira pamsika, ndi pini yogubuduza, mpukutu mpaka osachepera 1/2 inchi wandiweyani.  Ikani m'munsi mwa mphika wophika wachitsulo chakuya / mbale ndi mtanda.  Sungani pafupifupi 1/3 ya mtanda kuti muphimbe.  (Mudzayika izi pamwamba mukamaliza kukonzekera kudzaza.)  Ikani mabulosi akuda m'mbale pamwamba pa mtanda wa mpukutu.  Kuwaza 1 chikho cha shuga granulated, 2 tbs. Shuga wofiirira supuni 1 sinamoni, 1/2 chikho cha batala (Mu zidutswa zazing'ono), pamwamba.  Kuwaza 1/2 supuni ya mchere pamwamba.  Ikani chitumbuwa pa chirichonse.  Kuphika mu uvuni pa 375 kwa mphindi 40.  Chotsani mu uvuni pamene chitumbuwa cha bulauni ndi pie ndi bubbly.  Sangalalani.

goal: Momwe mungapangire chimanga succotash
sol1: Sungunulani supuni 3 za batala mu ayisikilimu churn. Saute 1 tsabola wofiira wodulidwa, mphindi 2. Onjezerani 2 1/2 makapu a chimanga chosaphika, 1 chikho cha nyemba za lima zosungunuka, 1/4 chikho cha madzi, supuni 2 za thyme yodulidwa, ndi mchere ndi tsabola kuti mulawe. Chivundikiro; simmer mphindi 5. Sakanizani mu 2 sliced scallions.
sol2: Sunungulani supuni 3 za batala mu skillet. Saute 1 tsabola wofiira wodulidwa, mphindi 2. Onjezerani 2 1/2 makapu a chimanga chosaphika, 1 chikho cha nyemba za lima zosungunuka, 1/4 chikho cha madzi, supuni 2 za thyme yodulidwa, ndi mchere ndi tsabola kuti mulawe. Chivundikiro; simmer mphindi 5. Sakanizani mu 2 sliced scallions.

goal: Nola pensulo ndi mpeni.
sol1: Khalani ndi mpeni wakuthwa kwambiri.  Gwirani pensulo m'dzanja limodzi ndi mpeni m'dzanja lina. Ikani mpeni pa pensulo pomwe mukufuna kuchepetsa pensulo, pamwamba pomwe mfundo ya pensulo idzakhala.  Sungani mpeni kutali ndi inu ndikupita ku mfundo. Ngodya ya mpeni iyenera kukhala yosazama kotero kuti imachotsa wosanjikiza wa zinthu pamene mpeni ukusunthidwa. Sinthani pensulo pang'ono ndikubwereza kuchotsa zinthuzo mpaka mfundo ya pensulo idapangidwa.
sol2: Khalani ndi mpeni wakuthwa kwambiri.  Gwirani pensulo m'dzanja limodzi ndi mpeni m'dzanja lina. Ikani mpeni pa pensulo pomwe mukufuna kuchepetsa pensulo, pamwamba pomwe mfundo ya pensulo idzakhala.  Gwirani mpeni pa madigiri 90 ku pensulo.  Sungani mpeni kutali ndi inu ndikupita ku mfundo.  Mpeni udzathyola pamwamba ndikuchita zochepa kwambiri.  Bwerezani ndondomekoyi mpaka mfundo ya pensulo itapangidwa.

goal: Momwe mungayeretsere makiyi a kiyibodi ya kompyuta yanu?
sol1: Kusunga makiyi a kompyuta oyera kungawonjezere moyo wa m'miyendo yanu kapena pamwamba pa desiki. Ngati simukuyeretsa makiyi, zizindikirozo pamapeto pake zimakhala zovuta kuwerenga ndipo mungapeze kuti mukupanga zolakwika zambiri zopusa zolemba, chifukwa chakuti simungathe kuwerenga makiyi. Thirani ngodya ya nsalu ndi windex, kapena viniga, ndikupukuta mosamala mpaka mutatha kuwonanso zizindikirozo bwino. Ngati zizindikirozo zavala kwathunthu, mutha kuzipaka utoto kachiwiri ndi misomali ya misomali.
sol2: Mutha kupeza zilembo zazing'ono zomwe zimangomata pamakiyi apakompyuta, ndipo simungavutikenso ndi windex kapena viniga. Makiyi a F nthawi zambiri amakhala achinyengo, chifukwa ndi ang'onoang'ono kwambiri, komabe mutha kuyika kapena kujambula chikwangwani cha makatoni pamwamba pa izi, zomwe zikuwonetsa zomwe aliyense ayenera kukhala.

sol2: Sakanizani zidutswa za anyezi wofiira, nkhaka yodulidwa, theka la azitona la kalamata, dill ndi feta. Valani ndi mafuta a azitona ndi madzi a mandimu; Puree kenako blanch ndi mchere ndi tsabola.

goal: Chotsani chivundikiro cha pepala m'buku.
sol1: Ikani kanjedza pansi patsamba loyamba la bukhu ndipo ndi mkasi dulani chivundikiro kuchokera ku chomangira. Tembenuzani bukuli ndikubwereza.
sol2: Ikani kanjedza pansi patsamba loyamba la buku ndipo ndi dzanja lanu lina pang'onopang'ono kukoka chivundikiro kuchokera ku chomangira. Tembenuzani bukuli ndikubwereza.

goal: Kuyeretsa AirPods
sol1: Pukutani ma AirPods ndi nsalu yofewa, youma, yopanda lint. Yeretsani maikolofoni ndi mauna oyankhula ndi swab youma thonje. Chotsani zinyalala zilizonse kuchokera ku mauna ndi burashi yoyera, youma, yolimba.
sol2: Pukutani ma AirPods ndi nsalu yofewa, youma, yopanda lint. Yeretsani maikolofoni ndi mauna oyankhula ndi swab youma thonje. Chotsani zinyalala zilizonse kuchokera ku mauna ndi burashi yoyera, youma, yofewa.

goal: Chotsani dents pa kapeti.
sol1: Lolani ayisikilimu asungunuke pa dent, kenako pat youma.
sol2: Lolani ayezi kusungunuka pa dent, kenako pat youma.

goal: Kodi mumapereka bwanji chipewa?
sol1: Yendetsani kutsogolo ndi pansi pang'ono.
sol2: Yendetsani patsogolo ndi m'mwamba pang'ono.

goal: Kodi mumayatsa bwanji machesi?
sol1: Mwamsanga thamangani mapeto akuda pamwamba pa bokosi la machesi kuti muyatse.
sol2: Ikani pa phula kwa masekondi 2 ndipo iyenera kuyatsa.

goal: Momwe mungapangire msuzi wa Strawberry Kiwi kunyumba.
sol1: Wiritsani 1 chikho Kiwi (chodulidwa), 1 chikho cha strawberries odulidwa ndi 3/4 chikho cha madzi ndi 1 chikho cha Maenje a Azitona kwa mphindi 30, kusonkhezera kuti musawotche pa med. kutentha pamwamba pa chitofu.
sol2: Wiritsani 1 chikho Kiwi (chodulidwa), 1 chikho cha strawberries odulidwa ndi 3/4 chikho cha madzi ndi 1 chikho cha shuga kwa mphindi 30, kusonkhezera kuti musawotche pa med. kutentha pamwamba pa chitofu.

goal: magazini
sol1: zitha kuwonongedwa ngati zinyowa ndi mop
sol2: zitha kuwonongedwa ngati zinyowa ndi mtsuko

goal: Kodi mumapanga bwanji kope la kiyi?
sol1: Tengani kiyi ku Walmart ndikupita ku Auto Center. Apangitseni kuti akupangitseni kope.
sol2: Dulani chidutswa chachitsulo mu mawonekedwe ofanana ndi kiyi wanu.

goal: kusunga miphika yachitsulo kuti ikhale youma
sol1: Sungani ndi nsalu zakale kapena matawulo a m'mphepete mwa nyanja pakati pawo
sol2: Sungani ndi nsalu zakale kapena thaulo la pepala pakati pawo

goal: Siponji
sol1: amatha kuyeretsa galimoto moyenera
sol2: amatha kuyeretsa mano bwino

goal: Kodi mumakonza bwanji pepala la papier mache?
sol1: Pezani mabokosi akale a makatoni ndikuwapanga athyathyathya. Dulani ndi zikwanje mpaka mutakhala ndi chidebe chodzaza ndi zidutswa zazing'ono za pepala.
sol2: Pezani nyuzipepala yakale kapena pepala la minofu kuchokera ku Khrisimasi. Dulani ndi zikwanje mpaka mutakhala ndi chidebe chodzaza ndi zidutswa zazing'ono za pepala.

goal: Kodi mukufunikira miyendo ingati patebulo la khofi?
sol1: Mufunika miyendo isanu
sol2: Muyenera miyendo inayi

goal: Kuti mupange ndondomeko yochita masewera olimbitsa thupi m'munsi mwa thupi mungachite kunyumba.
sol1: Chitani squats ndi lunges pamene mukugwira mafoni.
sol2: Chitani ma squats ndi ma lunges pamene mukugwira ma dumbbells.

goal: Phunzirani kupanga buffet yanga ya condiment ya BBQ's.
sol1: Fufuzani malonda a pabwalo ndikutenga chitini chakale cha muffin ndikuchigwiritsa ntchito pazinthu zanu zonse monga, mpiru, ketchup, mayo, msuzi wa bbq, dips ndi chilichonse chomwe mukufuna pang'ono.
sol2: Fufuzani malonda a bwalo ndikutenga nsapato yakale ndikuigwiritsa ntchito pazinthu zanu zonse monga, mpiru, ketchup, mayo, msuzi wa bbq, dips ndi chilichonse chomwe mukufuna pang'ono.

goal: Kodi ndinganyamule bwanji zovala mosavuta pazomangira ndikamayenda?
sol1: Tengani zovala zingapo zolemera kwambiri, kenako gwiritsani ntchito zovala zingapo pazomangira ndikuzinyamula zonse nthawi imodzi.
sol2: Tengani zovala zingapo zopanda kanthu zolemera, kenako gwiritsani ntchito zovala zingapo pazomangira zomangira ndikuzinyamula zonse nthawi imodzi.

goal: Kuwonjezera chokoleti ndi caramel ku mkaka wotentha ndi kirimu.
sol1: Dulani chokoleti m'magawo ang'onoang'ono. Bweretsani mkaka ndi kirimu kuti uziphika pamoto wochepa kapena wapakatikati. Chisakanizo chikayamba kuzizira, chotsani pamoto ndikuwonjezera chokoleti ndi msuzi wa caramel.
sol2: Dulani chokoleti m'magawo ang'onoang'ono. Bweretsani mkaka ndi kirimu kuti uziphika pamoto wochepa kapena wapakatikati. Pamene chisakanizo chikuyamba kuphulika, chotsani pamoto ndikuwonjezera chokoleti ndi msuzi wa caramel.

goal: Kupanga lalanje pulp kuchokera ku malalanje.
sol1: Peel malalanje ndikuyika mu blender.
sol2: Peel malalanje ndikugwiritsa ntchito chosakanizira chamanja.

goal: Ma marshmallows ophika.
sol1: Pangani moto pogwiritsa ntchito nkhuni. Ponyani marshmallow ndi ndodo ndikugwira ndodo pamoto mpaka marshamllow ikhale yotentha.
sol2: Pangani moto pogwiritsa ntchito nkhuni. Ikani marshmallow ndi ndodo ndikugwira ndodo pamoto mpaka marshamllow ikhale yotentha.

goal: Makina ochapira magetsi
sol1: ikhoza kuyeretsa sitima yokalamba yapamadzi yopanda dothi
sol2: Amatha kuyeretsa t-sheti yoyera yonyansa kuchokera ku grime

goal: Kodi ndingagule kuti mpira wa tenisi
sol1: Mutha kugula mpira wa tenisi ku sitolo iliyonse yamasewera
sol2: Mutha kugula racket ya tenisi pa sitolo iliyonse yamasewera
